bibl.title: Property Rights of Hellenistic Colonists.
bibl.note: Royal favourites - Ptolemaic or Seleucid or both - could own property outside a "polis". Attalid colonists could. We still do not know if the same was true for Seleucid or Ptolemaic overseas settlers.

bibl.title: Actes du VIIe Congrès de la F.I.E.C., 1979. I

bibl.seg: Cohen Getzel M., Property Rights of Hellenistic Colonists.
Actes du VIIe Congrès de la F.I.E.C., 1979. I (Budapest, 1984) pp. 323-325.

Royal favourites - Ptolemaic or Seleucid or both - could own property outside a "polis". Attalid colonists could. We still do not know if the same was true for Seleucid or Ptolemaic overseas settlers.
